settings.title: Working Holiday Starter
settings.description:
• Introduction to Working Holidays in Australia Guide

Get essential information on visa requirements, travel planning, and an overview of life in Australia.

  • Visa Application Assistance

Step-by-step guidance on applying for the Working Holiday Visa (subclass 417 or 462), ensuring all documentation is correctly completed.

  • Resume and Cover Letter Templates for Casual Jobs

Receive professionally designed templates to create your own standout resume and cover letter suitable for various casual roles.

  • Job Search Guide for Backpackers

Learn effective strategies for finding work in hospitality, tourism, agriculture, and other sectors popular among backpackers.

  • Accommodation and Travel Tips

Access insider advice on affordable accommodation options, transportation, and how to make the most of your Australian adventure.

settings.title: Adventure Seeker
settings.description:
Includes everything from the Working Holiday Starter Package, plus:

  • 30-Minute Personalised Consultation with Follow-Up Report

Discuss your travel and work plans with an expert, and receive a customised report with recommendations tailored to your interests.

  • Custom Resume and Cover Letter for Australian Employers

Receive professionally crafted documents that align with Australian employer expectations, increasing your chances of securing work.

  • Interview Preparation Guide for Casual Roles

Access tips on how to succeed in job interviews, including common questions and cultural expectations in Australian workplaces.

  • Job Placement Assistance

Benefit from our network of trusted employers; we’ll help connect you with job opportunities suited to your skills and preferences.

  • 30-Day Job Guarantee

We’re confident in our ability to help you find work—if you don’t secure a job within 30 days of arrival, we’ll continue to support you until you do.

settings.title: Ultimate Aussie Experience Package
settings.description:
Includes everything from the Adventure Seeker Package, plus:

  • Airport Pickup and Welcome Orientation

Arrive stress-free with airport pickup services and a welcome orientation to help you settle in quickly.

  • First Week Accommodation Assistance

We’ll arrange your first week’s accommodation in a reputable hostel or budget hotel, giving you a comfortable start to your journey.

  • Australian Bank Account and Tax File Number Setup

Assistance with setting up an Australian bank account and obtaining your Tax File Number, essential for working and getting paid.

  • Local SIM Card with Prepaid Credit

Stay connected from day one with a local SIM card, including prepaid credit for calls and data.

  • Social Events and Networking Opportunities

Invitations to exclusive events and meet-ups to help you connect with fellow travellers and locals.

  • Travel Planning Assistance and Discounts

Personalised help planning trips around Australia, plus exclusive discounts on tours, activities, and experiences.

  • 90-Day Job Guarantee

If you don’t secure a job within 90 days, we’ll continue to provide support until you do.

  • Priority Support and Unlimited Consultation

Enjoy dedicated assistance throughout your stay, with unlimited access to our team for any questions or help you need.
